overview: The Contact Us page for Digital Experience Healthcare provides a form for users to send inquiries, displays success or error banners based on submission results, and includes accessibility and theme toggle features.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Page header with title and subtitle
interactions: Click skip link to jump to main content
Toggle dark/light mode via theme button
Submit contact form with required fields
Display success banner on valid submission
Display error banner on failed submission
data_flow: User inputs name and email into form fields
If valid, data is sent to backend endpoint (not defined in HTML)
Success or error banner visibility toggled based on response
accessibility: ARIA roles and labels on navigation and banners
aria-required and aria-describedby on form inputs
Semantic headings and labels for form fields
test_ideas: Verify skip link focuses main content
Validate theme toggle updates aria-pressed and visual theme
Ensure required fields show validation messages when empty
Simulate successful form submission and assert success banner visibility
Simulate failed submission and assert error banner visibility
Confirm banners can be dismissed and hidden
Check ARIA attributes and roles for accessibility compliance
